title: Unable to transfer regions.
body: My account is quite old, and the last time I played I transferred off OCE back to NA to play with some friends. I recently picked LoL back up and (finally) verified my email address, though it appears I can't transfer back to OCE. If I recall correctly, before I verified my email, the option to purchase a region transfer was still in the store, however it is no longer there, and I'm stuck on NA. Is there any information on this? / A fix?

replies.body:
You're gonna have to hang in there for about another month. Unfortunately, transfers are disabled until November 20th in preparation for the pre-season. You can read more about this on the link below:

> Account transfers will be temporarily unavailable from October 10 until November 20.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown
